Column.Name: Procurement Process
Column.ValidationFormula:
LET $matches := ARRAY_LENGTH(DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Procurement Process", "[RecordID] <> " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([RecordID]) & " AND [Procurement Process] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Procurement Process]) ));
RETURN IF( $matches > 0, "Another procurement process has this same name" )

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY( "Details", "Process", "Output" );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)

Binding.Expression:
LET $text := "Setup"; LET $class := "pp-stage-box-on"; RETURN "
" & $text & HASH_GET([Icons], "Tick") & "
"

Label.Text: This section is for managing the steps that are included in this procurement process. Click on the rows to enable / disable each step.

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.pp-box {
  font-size: 16px;
  width: 100%;
  height: 31px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: 0.3s;
  border-left: 1px solid white; border-right: 1px solid white; border-top: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
  padding-left: 10px;
  padding-top: 7px;
}
.pp-box:hover {
  border: 1px solid steelblue
}
.pp-stage-box-on {
  background: #4682b4;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold; 
}
.pp-stage-box-off {
  opacity: 0.5; background: #adadad;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold; 
}
.pp-process-box-on {
  background: white;
}
.pp-process-box-locked {
  background: #e9e9e9;
  border-top: 1px solid #8b8b8b !important;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #8b8b8b !important;
}
.pp-process-box-off {
  opacity: 0.5; background: #f7f7f7;
}
</style>

FieldEntry.Formula: NOT([Setup Process Enabled])

Binding.Expression:
LET $class := IF( [Setup Process Enabled] = TRUE, "pp-process-box-on", "pp-process-box-off" ); RETURN "
" & HTMLENCODE([Setup Process Display Name]) & IF([Setup Process Enabled] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Icons], "Tick"), HASH_GET([Icons], "Blank") ) & IF([Setup Process Locked] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Icons], "Lock")) & "
"
AND( [Setup Process Locked]#([LineNumber]-1) <> TRUE, [Setup Process Locked] <> TRUE )
AND( [LineNumber] < ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [Setup Process]), [Setup Process Locked]#([LineNumber]+1) <> TRUE, [Setup Process Locked] <> TRUE )
AND( [Custom Checklist RecordID] <> NULL(), [Setup Process] = "Setup - Checklist" )

FieldEntry.Formula: EACH [Process Enabled]

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Rebuild Process List - all other records

FieldEntry.Formula: EACH [Process Enabled]
EACH [Process Enabled]

Information.Text: Rebuilds process list to inject new processes/stages. Note: the order of processes will be reset to default.
Rebuilds process list to inject new processes/stages. Note: the order of processes will be preserved based on the current settings.

FieldEntry.Formula: EACH [Setup Process Enabled]

Information.Text: Rebuilds process list to inject new processes/stages. Note: the order of processes will be preserved based on the current settings.

FieldEntry.Formula: NOT([Process Enabled])

Binding.Expression:
LET $class := IF( AND([Process Enabled] = TRUE, [Heading] = TRUE), "pp-stage-box-on", AND([Process Enabled] <> TRUE, [Heading] = TRUE), "pp-stage-box-off", [Process Enabled] = TRUE, "pp-process-box-on", "pp-process-box-off" ); RETURN "
" & HTMLENCODE([Process Display Name]) & IF([Process Enabled] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Icons], "Tick"), HASH_GET([Icons], "Blank") ) & "
"

IF( [Process] = "Timeline", "View Timeline",
OR( [Process] = "Plan - Checklist", [Process] = "Advertise - Checklist" ), "View Checklist" )

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL

FieldEntry.Formula: NOT([Setup Approval Required])

Binding.Expression:
LET $text := "Approval"; LET $class := IF( [Setup Approval Required] = TRUE, "pp-process-box-on", "pp-process-box-off" ); RETURN "
" & $text & IF([Setup Approval Required] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Icons], "Tick"), HASH_GET([Icons], "Blank") ) & "
"

FieldEntry.Formula: NOT([Setup Checklist Enabled])

Binding.Expression:
LET $text := "Checklist"; LET $class := IF( [Setup Checklist Enabled] = TRUE, "pp-process-box-on", "pp-process-box-off" ); RETURN "
" & $text & IF([Setup Checklist Enabled] = TRUE, HASH_GET([Icons], "Tick"), HASH_GET([Icons], "Blank") ) & "
"

IF( [Process] = "Timeline", "View Timeline",
OR( [Process] = "Plan - Checklist", [Process] = "Advertise - Checklist" ), "View Checklist" )

LET $set := ARRAY( "Process", "Documents", "Checklist", IF(ARRAY_INDEXOF([Distinct Stages], "Plan") > 0, "Timeline"), "Details" );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)

FieldEntry.Formula: NULL

Label.Text: What is the category of the output procurement
This process requires that the following documents are provided at the specified stages before being able to move forward.
This is the list of checklist items that will be required at the end of each phase of the process.
This table shows expected events and key dates that occur throughout the process. The timeline can be manually adjusted in the 'Plan' stage.

TextCriterion.Text: STEP TO [Procurement Process Instructional Text] ON [To].[RecordID] = [Instruction RecordID] GET [Instructional Text]

CASE WHEN [Stage] = 'Initiate' THEN '#FFD966'
WHEN [Stage] = 'Plan' THEN '#D9E1F2'
WHEN [Stage] = 'Advertise' THEN '#9bdcda'
WHEN [Stage] = 'Evaluate' THEN '#c0e5e8'
WHEN [Stage] = 'Award' THEN '#9BC2E6' END

Label.Text: This table shows all of the steps and information required throughout the process as well as the stage that the step takes place.

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.FieldValuesFormula:
LET $columns:= ARRAY( "Process Enabled", "Stage", "Process", "Process Display Name", "Heading", "Required", "Requires" );
LET $buildArray:= $(columnName, line, direction)( LET $array := CURRENT_EACHVALUE($columnName); RETURN IF( $direction = "up", ARRAY_CONCAT( // $direction, ARRAY_TAKE($array, $line-2), //$before, CURRENT_VALUE($columnName, $line), CURRENT_VALUE($columnName, $line-1), ARRAY_SKIP($array, $line) //$after ), $direction = "down", ARRAY_CONCAT( // $direction, ARRAY_TAKE($array, $line-1), //$before, CURRENT_VALUE($columnName, $line+1), CURRENT_VALUE($columnName, $line), ARRAY_SKIP($array, $line+1) //$after ), $array ) ); RETURN ARRAY_TO_HASH( $columns, $(i, columnName) $columnName, //key is column name $(i, columnName) CALL( $buildArray, $columnName, HASH_GET($eventargs, "line"), HASH_GET($eventargs, "direction")) )

Event.Name: Rebuild Process List
Event.Description: by default will preserve current order of processes. To reset order pass HASH("resetOrder", TRUE)

ARRAY_SELECT( [Temp], $(i, item) ARRAY_INDEX($item, 7) )
